law.text: An appeal may be taken from the judgment of the District Court overruling or sustaining an exception by the assignor, assignee or any party in interest, to the Circuit Court.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 300, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 88.
